name: Monster Egg (sellitos2020)
description:
You're locked in a lab, forced to take care of a strange egg that going to hatch soon.

You must spend 10 days looking after a soon to be born monster. 

The egg has different needs: has to be kept at a certain temperature, and needs love to survive.

When the monster is born, you need to train it, play with it, feed him, etc.  ( not in this demo)

Known bugs:

-when you get to your bed, there's  an accidentally untranslated spanish dialog. wich prompts a menu. First option means "sleep", second means "exit".

-if you try to go to bed too before 20:00 a dialog window should display "It's too early", but we also forgot to translate it.

Thanks for playing!
